Articles.Content: Now that the staging bar shows the Delta V info also, it would be great to show it in map view.  You plan burns in the map view and you can see how much delta V those take, but you can't see how much delta V you have unless you switch back to the vessel view.
I endorse this. Not because I want a delta-V view in the map view, but because I want to be able to see my staging sequence from the map view, since it makes flying from map view that much easier.

Yeah this is a good idea. Also being able to stage in map view when your current stage runs dry would be good too. So many times I'm part way through a burn in map view and then have to switch view twice to continue the burn with an engine with different performance.
If they could add this for Xbox, I will forgive all of Squad's mistakes and such and continue buying the DLCs.
